title: Property Editor shows properties of layout items in Master page viewer
description: The Property Editor continues to display the properties of layout items when switching to the Master page viewer.
OB: This may confuse customers who think they are in the Master Page Editor and inadvertently set properties without clicking on the Master Page viewer first.
EB: The Property Editor should not display the properties of layout items when in the Master page viewer.
SR: Fix the Property Editor to only show properties relevant to the Master page viewer when it is active.
